response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. This is an opportunity to secure a game-changing solution at a competitive advantage. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions.
